properties.areaDesc: Latimer, OK; Haskell, OK; Muskogee, OK; Sequoyah, OK
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 10 at 3:43PM CST until January 10 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Tulsa OK
properties.description:
At 343 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from 3 miles northeast of Gore to 5 miles east of Stigler
to 3 miles south of Lequire, moving northeast at 50 mph.

HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable
tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes,
roofs, and outbuildings.

Locations in or near the path include...
Sallisaw...                       Stigler...
Vian...                           Gore...
Porum...                          Webbers Falls...
Keota...                          Mccurtain...
Whitefield...                     Kinta...
Marble City...                    Tamaha...
Briartown...                      Robbers Cave State Park...
Mc Curtain...                     Lequire...
Kanima...                         Box...
Mc Key...                         Lewisville...

This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 279 and
304.
properties.instruction:
Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly
from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the
basement or small central room in a sturdy structure.

NWSheadline: A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CST FOR HASKELL...WESTERN SEQUOYAH...NORTHEASTERN LATIMER AND SOUTHEASTERN MUSKOGEE COUNTIES
